Package model.generator

package model.generator
The model.generator package contains classes and interfaces for generating SQL scripts from schema models. These generators create database schema scripts tailored to specific database platforms and formats.

This package simplifies the process of converting schema models into executable SQL scripts that can be used to create and manage database schemas.

Key classes and interfaces include:

  • SchemaGenerator: An interface defining the contract for schema generators, requiring a method to generate SQL scripts from schema models.
  • SqlGenerator: A concrete implementation of SchemaGenerator that generates SQL scripts for relational databases. Handles tables, columns, and relationships.
  • OracleGenerator: A concrete implementation of SchemaGenerator designed to produce SQL scripts specifically for Oracle databases.

Example usage:

     // Create an instance of a generator
     SchemaGenerator generator = new SqlGenerator();
     
     // Generate SQL script from a schema model
     String sqlScript = generator.generate(schemaModel);
     System.out.println(sqlScript);
Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    model
    The model package contains the core data structures and logic for representing and managing database schemas.
    model.exception
    The model.exception package contains custom exceptions used for error handling within the schema parsing and processing framework.
    model.factory
    The model.factory package contains factory classes responsible for creating instances of generators and parsers used in schema processing.
    model.parser
    The model.parser package contains classes and interfaces for parsing schema files and converting them into SchemaModel objects.
  • Class
    Description
    OracleGenerator
    Implementation of SchemaGenerator that generates SQL scripts for Oracle databases.
    SchemaGenerator
    Interface for schema generators that produce SQL scripts based on schema models.
    SqlGenerator
    Implementation of SchemaGenerator that generates SQL scripts for creating tables and managing relationships in databases.
